data.actual_result: The pfp circle overlaps the status bar and the time
data.expected_result: The pfp circle is below the status bar, and doesn’t overlap the time
data.short_description: [possibly 4 inch device only] The pfp circle overlaps the status bar when the users is listening to something like Spotify
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user that is listing to something like Spotify  - Click on them, and if not in the members list, click on user settings  - Observer where the pfp circle is
